thread.title: Hugh Jackman Got Skin Cancer AGAIN!
thread.title_full: Hugh Jackman Got Skin Cancer AGAIN!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Hugh Jackman Got Skin Cancer AGAIN!
text:
2/13/2017 6:48   Hugh Jackman • Twitter • Health • Cancer 
We can't believe this happened to him again! 
Hugh Jackman shared the news on Twitter Monday that he was treated for skin cancer yet again, writing: 
"Another basal cell carcinoma. Thanks to frequent checks & amazing doctors, all's well. Looks worse w the dressing on then off! WEARSUNSCREEN" 
This marks the Logan star's SIXTH time being treated in just three years , meaning we're rapidly approaching a day of future past where Hugh has gotten cancer more times than he's appeared in X-Men movies. Scary stuff. 
It's a good thing he heals like Wolverine in real life! 
Stay safe out there, everyone! And seriously — wear sunscreen!
